nodes.text: Krin Kallibin was a celebrated jockey that participated in fathier races. He was spotted by Kedpin Shoklop near the main entrance of the Canto Casino Hotel during his visit to Canto Bight. Riding the fathier Vermilion, Krin Kallibin won first place in at least two races. The pair participated in a race at Canto Bight racetrack that took place shortly before the Battle of Crait.
